name: ContactForm
description: Contact form with customizable fields, styling, and contact information

config.label: Title
config.placeholder: Get In Touch

config.label: Subtitle
config.placeholder: Ready to start your healing journey?

config.label: Background Color
config.placeholder: Choose background color for the section

config.label: Text Color
config.placeholder: Choose text color for good contrast

config.label: Accent Color
config.placeholder: Choose accent color for buttons and highlights

config.label: Form Submit Button Text
config.placeholder: Send Message

config.label: Success Message
config.placeholder: Thank you! We'll get back to you soon.

config.label: Contact Info Title
config.placeholder: Contact Information

config.label: Encouraging Message Title
config.placeholder: Taking the first step takes courage

config.label: Encouraging Message Text
config.placeholder: We're here to support you. All conversations are confidential and we typically respond within 24 hours.

config.label: Form Header Title
config.placeholder: Schedule Your First Session

config.label: Form Header Description
config.placeholder: Please share some information about yourself and what brings you here today.

config.label: Privacy Notice Title
config.placeholder: Your Privacy Matters

config.label: Privacy Notice Text
config.placeholder: All communications are strictly confidential and protected by professional counseling standards.

config.label: Consent Checkbox Text
config.placeholder: I understand that this form is secure and my information will be kept confidential. I consent to being contacted about scheduling an appointment.

config.label: Success Message Title
config.placeholder: Thank You for Reaching Out

config.label: Success Message Description
config.placeholder: We've received your message and will respond within 24 hours. Taking this step shows real strength.

config.label: Success Next Steps Text
config.placeholder: What's next? We'll review your message and reach out to schedule a brief consultation where we can discuss your needs and answer any questions.

config.label: Contact Field Type
config.placeholder: text

config.label: Field Label
config.placeholder: Full Name

config.label: Field Placeholder
config.placeholder: Enter your full name

config.label: Field Options (for select fields)
config.placeholder: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3

config.placeholder: phone

config.label: Contact Info Title
config.placeholder: Phone
